QAPair.Question: What is (are) T3 test ?
QAPair.Answer: Triiodothyronine (T3) is a thyroid hormone. It plays an important role in the body's control of metabolism (the many processes that control the rate of activity in cells and tissues). A laboratory test can be done to measure the amount of T3 in your blood.

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for T3 test? ?
